title: Man, 76, remanded over 'drug-laced sweets' at summer camp - BBC News
analysis: The main headline of this BBC news article is "Get the news your way." The key points include the introduction of a new personalized news experience and the option for users to choose which news they would like to receive. The summary is that the BBC has introduced a new feature on their website that allows users to customize their news experience by choosing the news they want to receive and selecting their preferred channels.
